post.body: OH yes I did =D
Finally on twitter =D
LOL I thought only Indian's dint believe in it =D
From mallu Christian friends say yes (not caste, its the church they go to that matters)
its basically what people are expecting a "tradictional media" to do on twitter
Hmm interesting read!
I started on Jan 18 last year 2,267 updates already
@Tuoni CNN IBN has too the same news
That is really sad news =(
I has read most of the links.Meanwhile I had watched some of the Pak channels after #Mumbai on youtube. They were so biased
No, could you send me the link pls?
Yes we will happily export few
No dude they got talented guys out there. These newspapers never bother thats all
Not that content is great either. It's as if reporters write what they saw in their dream. Should read some stories in dawn! =/
LOL not a bad idea! =D
LOL but if you notice something reeeeally suspicious. Do let us know =)
Oh cool, I saw it a few days back. I liked the Xbox keyboard better, easier to type I felt
Cool cam! can I borrow it for a day or two =P
Hmm dint happen for me =/
Nah it's office system wouldn't want to activate that. Others too use the system =/
Oops I meant comments. Not able to enable comments in tumblr for my 'Google reader shared items' feed
Posts coming in from my google reader feed doesn't have links by default. =( No idea how to enable it
Yes I do, but it' impossible to comment on posts coming from Google reader. No idea why thats so!
The DJ needs a kick in the butt. Who plays that song neways!
LOL no mention, have fun =D
LOL no use quitting its the same case anywhere and am not thinking of a career change either
That's not inhuman that's just how media industry works
Ah yes that's the silver lining. Tomorrow is a working day though =/
LOL happens. Get a new keyboard... are u talking abt ur laptop?
ah not that it was work in general
You used hair dryer on keyboard? Even I have done that couple of time.. Vaccum cleaner is what should be used!
Work =( and ya there was some problem with comments code in tumblr fixed that =P
Haven't played GTA much been busy spent like one hour not bad, a tad slow, but that was expected
DeusEx rocks, I wanted 2 play it after reading ur tweet, couldn't find CD so installing MaxPayne =D
No I was asking on which platform you played GTA IV.
which one do you play? I mean you play it on consoles?
Nah just bought it, started playing, heard its a little slow in comparison to other GTAs
RE: @DNAindia question to twitter wrld. What's expected from "traditional media" on twitter. PLS retweet. We appreciate replies 2 this ques
RE: @DNAindia Rumours of blasts in Bangalore: indeed a rumour.
RE @DNAindia Terrorists, tied threads and applied vermilion on their foreheads to pass off as locals incase intercepted by Ind forces
RE: @DNAindia Question to twitter world. What's expected from "traditional media" on twitter. PLS retweet. Appreciate replies to this ques
None of the present staff may be. How can they clarify about whose who worked there in the past?
Taj Group today said there was no indication that any of its employees was involved in the attack.
RE @DNAindia Indian Navy investigating ship found with corpse on board 20 kms off Mumbai coast.Terrorists may have hijacked the trawler
RE @danishk those stuck inside the hotels r safe and can communicate wid thier families via phones #mumbai
All news channels are using really cheesy music for the terror package
Timesnow site is loading really slowly
RE @shrik_shrek #Mumbai UShelp 888-407-4747 Brazilianhelp 9820686143 CNNIBN 1-613-996-8885 frm Canada, Mumbai Help22-2389 0606
Paris Hilton has been reportedly lined up to play the fairy Tinkerbell in a movie based on JM Barrie's novel “Peter Pan”!!!!!!!!!!!!
Rajasthan witnessed heavy polling - preliminary estimate of the turnout between at 65 and 68 percent
RT @DNAindia RED ALERT ISSUED AT BANGALORE, CHENNAI AND DELHI AIRPORTS
Someone needs to redesign websites of Pak newspapers. They suck big time!
Spot something suspicious in your neighborhood? We could help you. DNA invites citizen journalists visit eyesandears.in for info
RT @DNAindia: Riots in R T Nagar Bangalore. Don't travel to that side Pls retweet
Closed browser using only air apps now. Hmm so can Adobe air be considered a browser?
I closed chrome by mistake. Damn all ten tabs =( It should have a warning like in Firefox
Reading a pro-India post on New York Times. http://bit.ly/3xVjFV Not fully biased either
Trying tweetdeck after a looooooong time =P
Reading LinuxHater's Blog. No they don't mean it. They just sound frustrated http://linuxhaters.blogspot.com/
Hmm three tweets I made yest night vakow dint appear =/
Shifted to nice 2 Bedroom house in Ulsoor three days back, unpacked only yest. Need to go set up the kitchen tonight
Life is gonna be hectic tomorrow, off canceled this week =( boo hoo
RT @dnaindia India will begin auctioning spectrum for 3G wireless networks on Jan 16
"Nudged" @Ishme3t as I couldn't give him B'day bumps =P
Aaaaaargh.. today was one of the most irritating days in months.. huff! =/
Bought gta 4 pc
What does he men on the verge I thought they were isolated for a year now =P
Former ICC Prez Ehsaan Mani has said that Pakistan is on the verge of isolation from world cricket. Blamed India, Australia n England
Shifted to vodafone corporate connection, the call rates are so darn cheap =P
